Package it.polimi.ingsw.am37.model.character

Class Character

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am37.model.UpdatableObject
it.polimi.ingsw.am37.model.character.Character
public class Character extends UpdatableObject
This class represents the Character in the game. They have special effects to modify and improve the game. They are activated and usable only if advancedMove is enabled in GameManager. Each character has a starting price and a current price. When used each player needs to get the price. Use their effect with the useEffect(Option) and the first usage cause the starting price to increase.
